mapper.insert:
insert into biology.t_loop(CS_ID, START_POINT1, END_POINT1, STRAT_POINT2, END_POINT2, IC_NUM, FDR_VALUE)values
(#{item.CS_ID},#{item.START_POINT1},#{item.END_POINT1},#{item.START_POINT2},#{item.END_POINT2},#{item.IC_NUM},#{item.FDR_VALUE})
mapper.select: select IC_ID, CS_ID, START_POINT1, END_POINT1, STRAT_POINT2, END_POINT2, IC_NUM, FDR_VALUE from biology.t_loop where CS_ID=#{cs_id};

select IC_ID, CS_ID, START_POINT1, END_POINT1, STRAT_POINT2, END_POINT2, IC_NUM, FDR_VALUE from biology.t_loop where CS_ID=#{cs_id} and START_POINT1>=#{start} and STRAT_POINT2>=#{start} and END_POINT1<=#{end} and END_POINT2<=#{end};
